meanings.definition: Covered or decorated with a mural.
meanings.sent1: The muralled wall brightened up the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The museum had many muralled rooms showcasing different artists.
meanings.sent3: The muralled hallway made the school feel like an art gallery.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a muralled canvas of memories, each one a vibrant stroke.
meanings.sent5: The muralled garden wall was a masterpiece of colors and shapes.

meanings.sent1: The muralled building told stories of the city's history.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant was muralled with scenes of the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The muralled park benches made sitting feel like being in a painting.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were muralled with images of faraway lands and adventures.
meanings.sent5: The muralled playground walls transformed playtime into an artistic experience.
